alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 5:09AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Minor Flooding Possible This Morning... Persistent light to moderate rain which occurred during the overnight hours will continue through the morning today. Rainfall rates are not expected to be overly high along with the risk of flash flooding, however, minor flooding will be possible especially for flood prone and low lying areas. Additionally, small creeks and streams could become bank full, and possibly spill into adjacent locations. If you encounter flooded roadways, remember, turn around don`t drown.
